```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(plotly)
library(googlesheets4)
library(reactable)
library(htmltools)
library(DT)

# ============================
# CONFIG
# ============================
# Auth: GOOGLE_SA_JSON (full JSON string) for Posit Connect; GOOGLE_SA_JSON_PATH for local dev
GOOGLE_SA_JSON <- Sys.getenv("GOOGLE_SA_JSON", unset = "")
GOOGLE_SA_JSON_PATH <- Sys.getenv("GOOGLE_SA_JSON_PATH", unset = "")
SHORTCUT_TICKETS <- Sys.getenv("SHORTCUT_TICKETS", unset = "")
SHORTCUT_TICKETS_TAB_BUGS <- Sys.getenv("SHORTCUT_TICKETS_TAB_BUGS", unset = "Bugs")
SHORTCUT_TICKETS_TAB_FEATURES <- Sys.getenv("SHORTCUT_TICKETS_TAB_FEATURES", unset = "Features")
SHORTCUT_TICKETS_TAB_CHORES <- Sys.getenv("SHORTCUT_TICKETS_TAB_CHORES", unset = "Chores")
SHORTCUT_TICKETS_TAB_BUGS_RANGE <- Sys.getenv("SHORTCUT_TICKETS_TAB_BUGS_RANGE", unset = "A:I")
SHORTCUT_TICKETS_TAB_FEATURES_RANGE <- Sys.getenv("SHORTCUT_TICKETS_TAB_FEATURES_RANGE", unset = "A:H")
SHORTCUT_TICKETS_TAB_CHORES_RANGE <- Sys.getenv("SHORTCUT_TICKETS_TAB_CHORES_RANGE", unset = "A:H")

TIME_DATA_SHEET_ID <- Sys.getenv("TIME_DATA_SHEET_ID", unset = "")
TIME_DATA_SHEET_TAB <- Sys.getenv("TIME_DATA_SHEET_TAB", unset = "State")
TIME_DATA_SHEET_RANGE <- Sys.getenv("TIME_DATA_SHEET_RANGE", unset = "A:J")

# ============================
# DESIGN SYSTEM
# ============================
SEVERITY_COLORS <- c(
  "Need Triage"   = "#7F7F7F",  # neutral gray
  "S3 - Low"      = "#009E73",  # green (safe)
  "S2 - Medium"   = "#0072B2",  # blue
  "S1 - High"     = "#E69F00",  # orange
  "S0 - Critical" = "#D55E00"   # vermillion (NOT pure red)
)

HIERARCHY_COLORS <- c(
  "Regular Bug"  = "#E69F00",
  "Sub-task Bug" = "#009E73"
)

severity_levels <- c(
  "S0 - Critical",
  "S1 - High",
  "S2 - Medium",
  "S3 - Low",
  "Need Triage"
)

# Completed work colors (monthly completions by type)
WORKTYPE_COLORS <- c(
  "Bug"     = "#D55E00",  # vermillion
  "Feature" = "#0072B2",  # blue
  "Chore"   = "#009E73"   # bluish green
)

PRODUCT_COLORS <- c(
  "Tax"            = "#CC79A7",  # purple
  "Roth"           = "#56B4E9",  # sky blue
  "Platform"       = "#009E73",  # bluish green
  "Insurance/P&C"  = "#0072B2",  # blue
  "Estate"         = "#E69F00",  # orange
  "Automation"     = "#D55E00",  # vermillion
  "Unspecified"    = "#7F7F7F"   # gray
)

BASE_THEME <- theme_minimal(base_size = 12) +
  theme(
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#1f1f1f", color = NA),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#1f1f1f", color = NA),
    panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "#333333"),
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
    text = element_text(color = "#e6e6e6"),
    axis.text = element_text(color = "#cccccc"),
    axis.title = element_text(color = "#cccccc"),
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 14),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(color = "#aaaaaa"),
    legend.background = element_rect(fill = "#1f1f1f"),
    legend.key = element_rect(fill = "#1f1f1f"),
    legend.text = element_text(color = "#e6e6e6"),
    legend.title = element_text(color = "#e6e6e6")
  )

# ============================
# PLOTLY TITLE + BORDER HELPERS
# ============================
plotly_title <- function(text) {
  list(
    text = paste0("<b>", text, "</b>"),
    x = 0.02,
    xanchor = "left",
    font = list(size = 14, color = "#e6e6e6")
  )
}

add_plotly_border <- function(p, color = "#e6e6e6", width = 1) {
  p %>% layout(
    shapes = list(
      list(
        type = "rect",
        xref = "paper", yref = "paper",
        x0 = 0, y0 = 0, x1 = 1, y1 = 1,
        line = list(color = color, width = width),
        fillcolor = "rgba(0,0,0,0)"
      )
    )
  )
}

normalize_severity <- function(x) {
  x <- as.character(x)
  x <- stringr::str_trim(x)
  x[x %in% c("", NA, "NA")] <- "Need Triage"

  dplyr::recode(x,
    "Severity 0" = "S0 - Critical",
    "Severity 1" = "S1 - High",
    "Severity 2" = "S2 - Medium",
    "Severity 3" = "S3 - Low",
    "S0" = "S0 - Critical",
    "S1" = "S1 - High",
    "S2" = "S2 - Medium",
    "S3" = "S3 - Low",
    .default = x
  )
}

# ============================
# REACTABLE THEME + BADGES (STATIC FRIENDLY)
# ============================
REACTABLE_THEME_DARK <- reactableTheme(
  color = "#e6e6e6",
  backgroundColor = "#1f1f1f",
  borderColor = "#333333",
  stripedColor = "#242424",
  highlightColor = "#2b2b2b",
  cellPadding = "10px 12px",
  style = list(fontSize = "13px"),
  headerStyle = list(
    backgroundColor = "#1a1a1a",
    color = "#e6e6e6",
    borderColor = "#333333",
    fontWeight = 600
  ),
  tableBodyStyle = list(borderColor = "#333333")
)

severity_badge <- function(value) {
  val <- as.character(value)
  col <- SEVERITY_COLORS[[val]]
  if (is.null(col)) col <- "#777777"

  htmltools::div(
    style = list(
      display = "inline-block",
      padding = "3px 10px",
      borderRadius = "999px",
      background = col,
      color = "#111111",
      fontWeight = 700,
      fontSize = "12px",
      lineHeight = "18px"
    ),
    val
  )
}


# ---------- Readers ----------
read_bugs <- function() {
  googlesheets4::read_sheet(
    ss = SHORTCUT_TICKETS,
    sheet = SHORTCUT_TICKETS_TAB_BUGS,
    range = SHORTCUT_TICKETS_TAB_BUGS_RANGE,
    col_types = "c"
  )
}

read_features <- function() {
  googlesheets4::read_sheet(
    ss = SHORTCUT_TICKETS,
    sheet = SHORTCUT_TICKETS_TAB_FEATURES,
    range = SHORTCUT_TICKETS_TAB_FEATURES_RANGE,
    col_types = "c"
  )
}

read_chores <- function() {
  googlesheets4::read_sheet(
    ss = SHORTCUT_TICKETS,
    sheet = SHORTCUT_TICKETS_TAB_CHORES,
    range = SHORTCUT_TICKETS_TAB_CHORES_RANGE,

# ---------- Cleaners ----------
clean_bugs <- function(df) {
  df %>%
    mutate(
      `Created At` = parse_date_time(
        `Created At`,
        orders = c("ymd HMS", "mdy HMS", "ymd HM", "mdy HM", "ymd", "mdy"),
        tz = "UTC"
      ),
      Severity = normalize_severity(Severity),
      Product  = if_else(is.na(Product) | Product == "", "Unspecified", str_trim(Product)),
      Hierarchy_Type = if_else(is.na(`Parent ID`) | `Parent ID` == "", "Regular Bug", "Sub-task Bug")
    ) %>%
    filter(!is.na(`Created At`))
}

clean_completed <- function(df, type_label) {
  if (!("Completed At" %in% names(df))) df$`Completed At` <- NA_character_
  if (!("Story Points" %in% names(df))) df$`Story Points` <- NA_character_

  df %>%
    mutate(
      Type = type_label,
      `Completed At` = parse_date_time(
        `Completed At`,
        orders = c("ymd HMS", "mdy HMS", "ymd HM", "mdy HM", "ymd", "mdy"),
        tz = "UTC"
      ),
      Story_Points = suppressWarnings(readr::parse_number(as.character(`Story Points`))),
      Story_Points = replace_na(Story_Points, 0),
      Month = floor_date(`Completed At`, "month")
    ) %>%
    filter(!is.na(`Completed At`))
}

read_qa_snapshots <- function() {
  googlesheets4::read_sheet(
    ss = TIME_DATA_SHEET_ID,
    sheet = TIME_DATA_SHEET_TAB,
    range = TIME_DATA_SHEET_RANGE,
    col_types = "c"
  )
}

clean_qa_snapshots <- function(df) {
  if (!("Date/Time" %in% names(df))) {
    dt_col <- names(df)[tolower(names(df)) %in% c("date/time", "datetime", "date time", "timestamp")]
    if (length(dt_col) == 1) names(df)[names(df) == dt_col] <- "Date/Time"
  }

  df %>%
    mutate(
      `Date/Time` = parse_date_time(
        `Date/Time`,
        orders = c("mdy HMS", "mdy HM", "ymd HMS", "ymd HM", "ymd", "mdy"),
        tz = "UTC"
      ),
      `Bugs - Unscheduled` = suppressWarnings(as.numeric(`Bugs - Unscheduled`)),
      `Bugs - Ready for Development` = suppressWarnings(as.numeric(`Bugs - Ready for Development`)),
      `In Development` = suppressWarnings(as.numeric(`In Development`)),
      `Ready for Review` = suppressWarnings(as.numeric(`Ready for Review`)),
      `In QA` = suppressWarnings(as.numeric(`In QA`))
    ) %>%
    filter(!is.na(`Date/Time`)) %>%
    arrange(`Date/Time`)
}
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
# ============================
# STATIC SNAPSHOT (READ ONCE PER KNIT)
# ============================
auth_gs <- function() {
  if (nzchar(GOOGLE_SA_JSON)) {
    googlesheets4::gs4_auth(path = GOOGLE_SA_JSON)
  } else if (nzchar(GOOGLE_SA_JSON_PATH) && file.exists(GOOGLE_SA_JSON_PATH)) {
    googlesheets4::gs4_auth(path = GOOGLE_SA_JSON_PATH)
  } else {
    stop("Set GOOGLE_SA_JSON (Posit Connect) or GOOGLE_SA_JSON_PATH (local) with valid credentials")
  }
}
auth_gs()

BUGS_RAW     <- read_bugs()
FEATURES_RAW <- read_features()
CHORES_RAW   <- read_chores()
QA_RAW       <- read_qa_snapshots()

BUGS_DATA     <- BUGS_RAW %>% clean_bugs()
QA_STATE_DATA <- QA_RAW %>% clean_qa_snapshots()

COMPLETED_WORK_DATA <- bind_rows(
  clean_completed(BUGS_RAW, "Bug"),
  clean_completed(FEATURES_RAW, "Feature"),
  clean_completed(CHORES_RAW, "Chore")
) %>%
  mutate(Story_Points = replace_na(Story_Points, 0))
```

```{r monthly_bugs_severity}
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(lubridate)

SEVERITY_ORDER <- c("S3 - Low", "S2 - Medium", "S1 - High", "S0 - Critical", "Need Triage")

SEVERITY_COLORS <- c(
  "Need Triage"   = "#7F7F7F",  # neutral gray
  "S3 - Low"      = "#009E73",  # green (safe)
  "S2 - Medium"   = "#0072B2",  # blue
  "S1 - High"     = "#E69F00",  # orange
  "S0 - Critical" = "#D55E00"   # vermillion (NOT pure red)
)

end_month   <- floor_date(Sys.Date(), "month")
start_month <- end_month %m-% months(11)
month_seq   <- seq.Date(start_month, end_month, by = "1 month")

df <- BUGS_DATA %>%
  mutate(
    Month = floor_date(`Created At`, "month"),
    Severity = factor(Severity, levels = SEVERITY_ORDER)
  ) %>%
  filter(Month >= start_month, Month <= end_month)

if (nrow(df) == 0) {

  plotly_empty(type = "scatter") %>%
    layout(title = plotly_title("Monthly Bugs by Severity (Last 12 Months)"))

} else {

  agg <- df %>%
    count(Month, Severity, name = "n") %>%
    complete(Month = month_seq, Severity = SEVERITY_ORDER, fill = list(n = 0)) %>%
    arrange(Month, Severity)

  plt <- plot_ly()

  for (sev in SEVERITY_ORDER) {

    d <- agg %>% filter(Severity == sev)

    plt <- plt %>%
      add_trace(
        data = d,
        x = ~Month,
        y = ~n,
        type = "scatter",
        mode = "lines",
        line = list(color = SEVERITY_COLORS[[sev]], width = 0.5),
        stackgroup = "one",
        name = sev,
        fillcolor = SEVERITY_COLORS[[sev]]
      )
  }

  plt %>%
    layout(
      title = plotly_title("Monthly Bugs by Severity (Last 12 Months)"),
      plot_bgcolor = "#1f1f1f",
      paper_bgcolor = "#1f1f1f",
      xaxis = list(type = "date", dtick = "M1", showgrid = TRUE, gridcolor = "#333333"),
      yaxis = list(showgrid = TRUE, gridcolor = "#333333"),
      legend = list(font = list(color = "#ffffff"))
    )
}
```

Weekly Bugs
=====================================

###
```{r weekly_bugs_product_final_hover}
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(lubridate)
library(stringr)

# 1. DEFINE THE WINDOW
today_date <- Sys.Date()
end_week   <- as.Date(floor_date(today_date, "week", week_start = 7))
start_week <- end_week - weeks(26) 

# 2. PREPARE THE DATA
df <- BUGS_DATA %>%
  mutate(
    # Convert to Date to remove time (Fixes Spikes)
    Week = as.Date(floor_date(`Created At`, "week", week_start = 7)),
    Product = if_else(is.na(Product) | Product == "", "Unspecified", str_trim(Product))
  ) %>%
  filter(Week >= start_week, Week <= end_week)

# 3. CHECK FOR EMPTY DATA
if (nrow(df) == 0) {
  plotly_empty(type = "scatter") %>%
    layout(title = "No Data Found")
} else {

  # 4. FILL GAPS
  product_levels <- names(PRODUCT_COLORS)
  
  agg <- df %>%
    count(Week, Product, name = "n") %>%
    complete(
      Week = seq.Date(start_week, end_week, by = "week"),
      Product = product_levels, 
      fill = list(n = 0)
    ) %>%
    arrange(Week, Product)

  # 5. PLOT
  plt <- plot_ly()

  for (prod in product_levels) {
    d <- agg %>% filter(Product == prod)

    plt <- plt %>%
      add_trace(
        data = d,
        x = ~Week,
        y = ~n,
        type = "scatter",
        mode = "lines",
        stackgroup = "one",
        name = prod,
        line = list(
          color = PRODUCT_COLORS[[prod]],
          width = 0.5,
          shape = "spline", 
          smoothing = 0.5
        ),
        fillcolor = PRODUCT_COLORS[[prod]],
        hovertemplate = paste0(
          "Week: %{x|%b %d}<br>",
          "Bugs: %{y}<br>",
          "Product: ", prod,
          "<extra></extra>"
        )
      )
  }

  plt %>%
    layout(
      title = plotly_title("Weekly Bugs by Product (Last 6 Months)"),
      plot_bgcolor = "#1f1f1f",
      paper_bgcolor = "#1f1f1f",
      
      # --- HOVER FIX IS HERE ---
      hovermode = "closest",  # Changed from "x unified" to "closest"
      # -------------------------
      
      xaxis = list(
        type = "date",
        tickformat = "%b %d",
        dtick = 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000,
        tick0 = start_week,
        showgrid = TRUE,
        gridcolor = "#333333"
      ),
      yaxis = list(
        title = "Bugs Created",
        showgrid = TRUE,
        gridcolor = "#333333",
        rangemode = "tozero"
      ),
      legend = list(font = list(color = "#ffffff"))
    )
}
```

```{r}
        type = "bar",
        name = t,
        marker = list(color = WORKTYPE_COLORS[[t]])
      )
  }

  plt %>%
    layout(
      barmode = "stack",
      title = plotly_title("Completed Story Points by Type (Last 12 Months)"),
      plot_bgcolor = "#1f1f1f",
```

```{r}
  plotly_empty(type = "bar") %>% layout(title = plotly_title("Distribution of Completed Work (Monthly %)"))
} else {

  agg <- df %>%
    count(Month, Type, name = "Count") %>%
    complete(Month = month_seq, Type = names(WORKTYPE_COLORS), fill = list(Count = 0)) %>%
    group_by(Month) %>%
    mutate(
      Total = sum(Count),
      Percent = if_else(Total == 0, 0, Count / Total)
    ) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    arrange(Month, Type)

  plt <- plot_ly()
  for (t in names(WORKTYPE_COLORS)) {
    d <- agg %>% filter(Type == t)
    plt <- plt %>%
      add_trace(
        data = d,
        x = ~Month,
        y = ~Percent,
        type = "bar",
        name = t,
        marker = list(color = WORKTYPE_COLORS[[t]]),
        hovertemplate = paste0(
          "Month: %{x|%Y-%b}<br>",
          "Type: ", t, "<br>",
          "Share: %{y:.1%}<br>",
          "Count: %{customdata} tickets",
          "<extra></extra>"
        ),
        customdata = ~Count
      )
  }

  plt %>%
    layout(
      barmode = "stack",
      title = plotly_title("Distribution of Completed Work (Monthly %)"),
      plot_bgcolor = "#1f1f1f",
      paper_bgcolor = "#1f1f1f",
      margin = list(b = 60),
      xaxis = list(
        type = "date",
        tickformat = "%Y-%b",
        dtick = "M1",
        tick0 = format(start_month, "%Y-%m-%d"),
        showgrid = TRUE,
        gridcolor = "#333333"
      ),
      yaxis = list(
        title = "Percentage of Total",
        tickformat = ".0%",
        showgrid = TRUE,
        gridcolor = "#333333",
        range = c(0, 1)
      ),
      legend = list(orientation = "h", x = 0.02, y = -0.15)
    )
}
```

### Backlog Bugs (Severity 0–1)

```{r}
df <- BUGS_DATA

# Defensive cleaning for filtering
df <- df %>%
  mutate(
    `Story Type` = if ("Story Type" %in% names(.)) as.character(`Story Type`) else NA_character_,
    State = if ("State" %in% names(.)) stringr::str_trim(as.character(State)) else NA_character_,
    Severity_raw = normalize_severity(Severity),
    Severity_raw = stringr::str_trim(as.character(Severity_raw)),
    Product = if_else(is.na(Product) | Product == "", "Unspecified", str_trim(Product))
  )

# Backlog states (case/whitespace tolerant)
if ("State" %in% names(df)) {
  df <- df %>% filter(tolower(State) %in% c("unscheduled", "ready for development"))
}

# Severity 0–1 (tolerant: any S0/S1 prefix)
df <- df %>%
  filter(stringr::str_detect(Severity_raw, "^S[01]\\b")) %>%
  select(`Ticket ID`, Name, Severity = Severity_raw, Product, State) %>%
  arrange(factor(Severity, levels = c("S0 - Critical", "S1 - High")), Product, State)

if (nrow(df) == 0) {
  cat("No S0/S1 backlog bugs found.")
} else {
  reactable(
    df,
    theme = REACTABLE_THEME_DARK,
    searchable = FALSE,
    pagination = TRUE,
    defaultPageSize = 10,
    highlight = TRUE,
    bordered = TRUE,
    compact = TRUE,
    defaultColDef = colDef(vAlign = "top"),
    columns = list(
      `Ticket ID` = colDef(width = 90),
      Name        = colDef(minWidth = 520, style = list(whiteSpace = "normal")),
      Severity    = colDef(width = 130, cell = function(value) severity_badge(value)),
      Product     = colDef(width = 150),
      State       = colDef(width = 190)
    )
  )
}
```

### Backlog Bugs Older Than 6 Months

```{r}
cutoff <- lubridate::floor_date(Sys.time(), unit = "day") %m-% months(6)

df <- BUGS_DATA

if ("Story Type" %in% names(df)) {
  df <- df %>% filter(tolower(stringr::str_trim(as.character(`Story Type`))) == "bug")
}

if ("State" %in% names(df)) {
  df <- df %>% filter(tolower(stringr::str_trim(as.character(State))) %in% c("unscheduled", "ready for development"))
}

df <- df %>%
  mutate(
    Severity_raw = normalize_severity(Severity),
    Severity_raw = stringr::str_trim(as.character(Severity_raw)),
    Product = if_else(is.na(Product) | Product == "", "Unspecified", str_trim(Product))
  ) %>%
  filter(!is.na(`Created At`), `Created At` < cutoff) %>%
  mutate(Age_Days = as.integer(difftime(Sys.time(), `Created At`, units = "days"))) %>%
  select(`Ticket ID`, Name, Severity = Severity_raw, Product, State, `Created At`, Age_Days) %>%
  arrange(desc(Age_Days))

if (nrow(df) == 0) {
  cat("No backlog bugs older than 6 months found.")
} else {
  reactable(
    df,
    theme = REACTABLE_THEME_DARK,
    searchable = FALSE,
    pagination = TRUE,
    defaultPageSize = 10,
    highlight = TRUE,
    bordered = TRUE,
    compact = TRUE,
    defaultSorted = "Age_Days",
    defaultSortOrder = "desc",
    defaultColDef = colDef(vAlign = "top"),
    columns = list(
      `Ticket ID`  = colDef(width = 90),
      Name         = colDef(minWidth = 520, style = list(whiteSpace = "normal")),
      Severity     = colDef(width = 130, cell = function(value) severity_badge(value)),
      Product      = colDef(width = 150),
      State        = colDef(width = 190),
      `Created At` = colDef(
        width = 170,
        cell = function(value) if (is.na(value)) "" else format(value, "%Y-%m-%d")
      ),
      Age_Days     = colDef(width = 110)
    )
  )
}
```
